sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import Link from 'next/link' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import ScrollAnimation from 'react-animate-on-scroll'; import { bounce } from 'react-animations'; import styled, { keyframes } from 'styled-components' const fakeData = [ { id: 1, name: "Walailak Day", detail: "รายละเอียด.", place: "สนามกีฬา1", price: 200, compet_start: "2020-01-01", compet_end: "2020-01-01", start: "2020-01-01", end: "2020-01-01", pay_end: "2020-01-01", //gens: [Competition_Gen] }, { id: 2, name: "Walailak Day2", detail: "รายละเอียด..", place: "สนามกีฬา2", price: 300, compet_start: "2020-01-01", compet_end: "2020-01-01", start: "2020-01-01", end: "2020-01-01", pay_end: "2020-01-01", //gens: [Competition_Gen] }, { id: 3, name: "Walailak Day3", detail: "รายละเอียด...", place: "สนามกีฬา3", price: 600, compet_start: "2020-01-01", compet_end: "2020-01-01", start: "2020-01-01", end: "2020-01-01", pay_end: "2020-01-01", //gens: [Competition_Gen] } ] function Competition() { return ( Badminton Competitions {fakeData.map(prod => ( Card Title Card Subtitle Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content. Card Link Another Link {/* {prod.name} สถานที่ : {prod.place} ค่าสมัคร : {prod.price} วันสิ้นสุดจ่ายเงิน : {prod.pay_end} วันรับสมัคร : {prod.start} วันสิ้นสุดรับสมัคร : {prod.end} วันเริ่มการแข่งขัน : {prod.compet_start} วันสิ้นสุดการแข่งขัน : {prod.compet_end} */} ))} ) } // const divstyle = { // display: 'grid', // justifyContent: 'center' // }np const Bounce = styled.div`animation: 2s ${keyframes`${bounce}`} infinite`; const card = { border: "outset", padding: 10, margin: 30, backgroundColor: "Gray" } const Title = { fontSize: 120 } const SubTitle = { fontSize: 30 } export default Competition;
